title: [GAMEPLAY] Riot Girl Tristana Ingame Visual Bug
body:
Today I got Trist in the new **ARAM** map, and picked **Riot Girl Tristana**. As I was playing, I noticed she was behaving in a strange way with her gun.

This strange interaction occurs when she stops walking, and the gun takes a very strange position, as if she was holding it infront of her, but it doesn't look natural, and I'm pretty sure it's a bug.
I don't think that's intentnional, but it's better illustrated on the video that I captured.

The bug happened also in **Summoner's Rift**, **The Crystal Scar** and the **Twisted Treeline**, as I tried Trist in those maps soon after to make sure it wasn't just a thing of the new **ARAM** map. Upon further testing, I tried out a couple more skins, and the bug seems to be **only** for the **Riot Girl Tristana** skin.

replies.body:
Hey FNC Saki,

Thanks for the report! We're currently aware of this issue with Riot Girl Tristana and are working to resolve the issue.
